title: 论坛是怎么了？
author: ENBRTF
txt_content:
刚刚我登论坛的时候，连续出现了错误502和错误500。下面是502的错误报告：
502 Bad Gateway
The proxy server received an invalid response from an upstream server. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!

URL: http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php

Server: cn-zjqz1-dx

Date: 2014/07/26 22:57:18

Powered by Tengine
论坛到底是出毛问题了啊？！

replies.author: 猪蹄子
replies.txt_content:
同LZ 
论坛大姨妈来了~

replies.txt_content:
1.又被攻击了 2.又被攻击了 3.又被攻击了 4.又被攻击了 5.又被攻击了

replies.txt_content:
憋蛋新，猖优得屎
屎不宜吃，快报告！

replies.author: a18964819868
replies.txt_content: 啊，姨妈期又来了- -我之前还做过调查的说

replies.txt_content: 我也有过这种情况，到底是怎么回事啊{:10_494:}

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content: ,.论坛最近越来越容易奔溃了。。
